title: Adware?.... o.o

replies.body: You can get Adware sometimes by browsing the internet and they sneak it in to your download.A regular virus scan should get rid of it.
replies.body_tagged: You can get Adware sometimes by browsing the internet and they sneak it in to your download.A regular virus scan should get rid of it.

replies.body: Go to add ons to remove it.
replies.body_tagged: Go to add ons to remove it.

replies.body: I have some kind of "computer cleaner & fastener" virus on my comp, and i can't seem to get rid of it. I made a new account on my comp and haven't gotten any effects of the virus on this account, so that's an easy way to get rid of it.
replies.body_tagged: I have some kind of "computer cleaner & fastener" virus on my comp, and i can't seem to get rid of it. I made a new account on my comp and haven't gotten any effects of the virus on this account, so that's an easy way to get rid of it.

replies.body:
Search up control panel

Programs> Uninstall a program> Get rid of all the crap that you don't need. Some may trick you that they're intel drivers but they're actually not. I've experienced that on my sister's laptop.
replies.body_tagged:
Search up control panel

Programs> Uninstall a program> Get rid of all the crap that you don't need. Some may trick you that they're intel drivers but they're actually not. I've experienced that on my sister's laptop.

replies.body: If you have any issues with viruses, malwares or adwares you should not scan your computer with your anti-virus program as the virus is always one step a head of you and it will hide, I promise. When you start your computer, every system, program and even some files will run automatically, by starting your computer in safe-mode (you boot into safe-mode by holding F8 as soon as you start your computer) not a single program or file will be able to run(it's why it's called safe-mode). It's when you are in safe-mode you should scan your computer.
replies.body_tagged: If you have any issues with viruses, malwares or adwares you should not scan your computer with your anti-virus program as the virus is always one step a head of you and it will hide, I promise. When you start your computer, every system, program and even some files will run automatically, by starting your computer in safe-mode (you boot into safe-mode by holding F8 as soon as you start your computer) not a single program or file will be able to run(it's why it's called safe-mode). It's when you are in safe-mode you should scan your computer.

replies.body:
Here is what i did:

Deleted The following:
  • Check Me Up
  • Super Scanner
  • Wajam Internet Inhancer
Now that i have done that, You may or may not lose connection/Mess up your proxy.
How i fixed it: Create A second account on ur PC (If you have one already go to it), In your Search bar type "Proxy" > Hit enter. Go to "LAN". Remove the any numbers from 'adress', Type in the First 2 numbers of your WNK (Wireless Network Key) In the 'Ports' Section. Congratulations, you have safely restored your PC. (Type that in your first account, not the second one).
replies.body_tagged:
Here is what i did:

How i fixed it: Create A second account on ur PC (If you have one already go to it), In your Search bar type "Proxy" > Hit enter. Go to "LAN". Remove the any numbers from 'adress', Type in the First 2 numbers of your WNK (Wireless Network Key) In the 'Ports' Section. Congratulations, you have safely restored your PC. (Type that in your first account, not the second one).
